EXPLANATION.FS_GLM_dir: path to the folder were the glm analysis will be made
EXPLANATION.STATS_HOME: path to the folder were stats will be saved
EXPLANATION.prediction_vars: variables for prediction analysis; target is the column used for prediction; pca_threshold 0.5 is 50% threshold for PCA analysis, skf_NUM_ITER is the number of iterations for the skf prediction, NUM_ITER: is the number of iterations used to repeat SKF prediction; nr_threads is the number of threads used to send the analysis to
EXPLANATION.cor_methods: names of the methods used for correlational analysis
EXPLANATION.cor_level_chosen: level of correlations that the used want to receive results for
EXPLANATION.fname_fs_per_param: name of the file with FreeSurfer stats in format one sheet per parameter per atlas per hemisphere
EXPLANATION.fname_fs_all_stats: name of the file with FreeSurfer stats results, all results on one sheet
EXPLANATION.fname_fs_subcort_vol: name of the file with FreeSurfer stats only of subcortical volumes
EXPLANATION.fname_NaNcor: name of the file where all values were checked for missing values (nan); missing values are changed to column mean
EXPLANATION.fname_eTIVcor: name of the file with FreeSurfer stats in which subcortical volumes were corrected for estimated Total Intracranial Volume (eTIV
EXPLANATION.fname_Outcor: name of the file where all values were checked for outliers; outliers are changed to column mean
EXPLANATION.file_type: xlsx (default), xslx, csv - type of file that user want to use to save the final stats results
